subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Players and team managers say that the field at Wembley is dangerous and that they want an investigation because players could be hurt in the May 15 F. A. Cup final between Chelsea  and Portsmouth.
snippet: Players and team managers say that the field at Wembley is dangerous and that they want an investigation because players could be hurt in the May 15 F. A. Cup final between Chelsea  and Portsmouth.
